targets.expr: avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_temperature{instance=~"$instance",temperature_type="current"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_smartctl_exit_status{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})
avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_smart_status{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (increase(smartctl_device_power_on_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}[1h]) * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_power_cycle_count{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})
avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_percentage_used{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_nvme_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_num_err_log_entries{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Number of error log entries
panels.description: Contains the number of Error Information log entries over the life of the controller

targets.expr: avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_media_errors{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Number of media errors
panels.description: Contains the number of occurrences where the controller detected an unrecovered data integrity error. Errors such as uncorrectable ECC, CRC checksum failure, or LBA tag mismatch are included in this field

targets.expr: avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_error_log_count{instance=~"$instance",error_log_type="summary"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_critical_warning{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Critical warnings for state of controller

targets.expr: avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_interface_speed{instance=~"$instance",speed_type="current"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_capacity_blocks{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})
avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_bytes_written{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})
avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_bytes_read{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_block_size{instance=~"$instance",blocks_type="logical"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_block_size{instance=~"$instance",blocks_type="physical"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_available_spare_threshold{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Available spare threshold
panels.description: When the Available Spare falls below the threshold indicated in this field, an asynchronous event completion may occur. The value is indicated as a normalized percentage (0 to 100%)

targets.expr: avg by (model_name, serial_number, device, instance) (smartctl_device_available_spare{instance=~"$instance"} * on(device) group_left(model_name, serial_number) smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Available spare
panels.description: Normalized percentage (0 to 100%) of the remaining spare capacity available
